resources.string: Please check your network connection and try again. Internet connection is required to fetch latest font dictionaries from Font Awesome web page.

Font Awesome Icons v1.3
Designed and developed by Sumit.

Special thanks to Font Awesome TTF for making this possible.
\n\nTap here to view generated XML file.
Please enable storage access to export icons.xml file. To enable access, tap on Export XML option again.
